info.name: Receivables Receipts
info.description:
This collection has been forked from standard structure and contains an intial folder structure and examples to aid in creating the required postman tests. Some folders contain scripts that should not be modified and will be indicated at the biginning of the script.

This collection should be named to reflect the Integrator it is testing.

item.name: LOVs
Examples
REST Example

item.description:
This folder contains the tests for the REST column named.

A Search test is required if the column is searchable, otherwise a Shortlist test is required. Note that neither of these tests are required if the column is not 'Is Sheet Column'. These test simulate the form field.

Should the column have loose dependencies, the test above should include all dependent values. A second 'Search/Shortlist no loose dependencies' test should be created that has all loose dependency values removed.

A MultiRow test is required to simulate validation and should contain multiple validation values.

item.name: OBIEE Example

exec: // IMPORTANT! When updating expectedQuery or expectedResults, please beautify this script afterwards via https://beautifier.io/
// REQUIRED: Define the report type - OBIEE or REST
// REQUIRED: Define the expected results as a JSON object. This can be obtained from the console when first being run
// NOTE: If the actual results change, make sure to analyse why they have changed before updating the expected results -

// Set the formatted expected results as an environment variable
// OPTIONAL: Set array of columns to excluded from results comparrison eg ["LastUpdateDate","CurrentDate"]

body.raw:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:pub="http://xmlns.oracle.com/oxp/service/PublicReportService" xmlns:soapenv="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope">
    <soapenv:Body>
        <pub:runReport>
            <pub:reportRequest>
                <pub:reportAbsolutePath>REPORT_PATH</pub:reportAbsolutePath>
                <pub:sizeOfDataChunkDownload>-1</pub:sizeOfDataChunkDownload>
                <pub:attributeLocale>en-US</pub:attributeLocale>
                <pub:attributeTemplate>Default</pub:attributeTemplate>
                <pub:attributeFormat>xml</pub:attributeFormat>
                <pub:byPassCache>true</pub:byPassCache>
                <pub:flattenXML>false</pub:flattenXML>
                <pub:parameterNameValues>
                    <!-- <pub:item>
                        <pub:name>DEPENDENCY</pub:name>
                        <pub:multiValuesAllowed>true</pub:multiValuesAllowed>
                        <pub:values>
                            <pub:item></pub:item>
                        </pub:values>
                    </pub:item> -->
                    <!-- <pub:item>
                        <pub:name>REPORT_RESTRICT_FIELD</pub:name>
                        <pub:multiValuesAllowed>true</pub:multiValuesAllowed>
                        <pub:values>
                            <pub:item>Value1</pub:item>
                            <pub:item>Value2</pub:item>
                        </pub:values>
                    </pub:item> -->
                    <pub:item>
                        <pub:name>REPORT_SEARCH_FIELD</pub:name>
                        <pub:multiValuesAllowed>true</pub:multiValuesAllowed>
                        <pub:values>
                            <pub:item>ABC%</pub:item><!-- search fileds should restrict to return a few rows -->
                        </pub:values>
                    </pub:item>
                </pub:parameterNameValues>
            </pub:reportRequest>
        </pub:runReport>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

item.description:
This folder contains the tests for the OBIEE column named.

A Search test is required if the column is searchable, otherwise a Shortlist test is required. Note that neither of these tests are required if the column is not 'Is Sheet Column'. These test simulate the form field.

Should the column have loose dependencies, the test above should include all dependent values. A second 'Search/Shortlist no loose dependencies' test should be created that has all loose dependency values removed.

A MultiRow test is required to simulate validation and should contain multiple validation values.

This folder contains examples for each type of LOV that can be duplicated as the starting point for your columns tests.

Do NOT duplicate this folder. It has a script that prevents its contents from being run when using the TestRunner environment. Instead, duplicate the required folder below this.

ie: either the REST or OBIEE Example

This folder must not be moved, renamed, or deleted.

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:pub="http://xmlns.oracle.com/oxp/service/PublicReportService" xmlns:soapenv="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope">
    <soapenv:Body>
        <pub:runReport>
            <pub:reportRequest>
                <pub:reportAbsolutePath>/Custom/More4apps-Finance/Finance/Receipts/APPLICATION_REFERENCE_ACTIVITY_REPORT.xdo</pub:reportAbsolutePath>
                <pub:sizeOfDataChunkDownload>-1</pub:sizeOfDataChunkDownload>
                <pub:attributeLocale>en-US</pub:attributeLocale>
                <pub:attributeTemplate>Default</pub:attributeTemplate>
                <pub:attributeFormat>xml</pub:attributeFormat>
                <pub:byPassCache>true</pub:byPassCache>
                <pub:flattenXML>false</pub:flattenXML>
                <pub:parameterNameValues>
                    <pub:item>
                        <pub:name>BU_ID</pub:name>
                        <pub:multiValuesAllowed>false</pub:multiValuesAllowed>
                        <pub:values>
                            <pub:item>300000046987012</pub:item>
                            <pub:item>300000046987012</pub:item>
                            <pub:item>300000046987012</pub:item>
                            <pub:item>300000046987012</pub:item>
                            <pub:item>300000046987012</pub:item>
                        </pub:values>
                    </pub:item>
                    <pub:item>
                        <pub:name>CUSTOMER_NUMBER</pub:name>
                        <pub:multiValuesAllowed>false</pub:multiValuesAllowed>
                        <pub:values>
                            <pub:item>10010</pub:item>
                            <pub:item>70030</pub:item>
                            <!-- <pub:item>blank for on account</pub:item> -->
                            <!-- <pub:item>blank for Write Off</pub:item> -->
                            <!-- <pub:item>blank for Refund</pub:item> -->
                        </pub:values>
                    </pub:item>
                    <pub:item>
                        <pub:name>APPLICATION_REFERENCE</pub:name>
                        <pub:multiValuesAllowed>false</pub:multiValuesAllowed>
                        <pub:values>
                            <pub:item>229814</pub:item>
                            <pub:item>1001173</pub:item>
                            <pub:item>On Account</pub:item>
                            <pub:item>Receipt Write-off</pub:item>
                            <pub:item>Refund</pub:item>
                        </pub:values>
                    </pub:item>
                </pub:parameterNameValues>
            </pub:reportRequest>
        </pub:runReport>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

item.description:
This folder should contain sub-folders that replicate the Integrators Section structure. Each Section folder then has sub-folders for each Integrator Column, which then holds the specific request tests for that column.

This folder must not be moved, renamed, or deleted.

item.name: Downloads
Examples

body.raw:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:pub="http://xmlns.oracle.com/oxp/service/PublicReportService" xmlns:soapenv="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope">
  <soapenv:Body>
    <pub:runReport>
      <pub:reportRequest>
        <pub:reportAbsolutePath>REPORT_PATH</pub:reportAbsolutePath>
        <pub:sizeOfDataChunkDownload>-1</pub:sizeOfDataChunkDownload>
        <pub:attributeLocale>en-US</pub:attributeLocale>
        <pub:attributeTemplate>Default</pub:attributeTemplate>
        <pub:attributeFormat>xml</pub:attributeFormat>
        <pub:byPassCache>true</pub:byPassCache>
        <pub:flattenXML>false</pub:flattenXML>
        <pub:parameterNameValues>
          <pub:item>
            <pub:name>_PARAM</pub:name>
            <pub:values>
              <pub:item>%</pub:item>
            </pub:values>
          </pub:item>
          <!-- exclude all sections in one request -->
          <pub:item>
            <pub:name>EXCLUDE__SECTION_PARAM</pub:name>
            <pub:values>
              <pub:item>Y</pub:item>
            </pub:values>
          </pub:item>
          <pub:item>
            <pub:name>HAS__BRANCH_CRITERIA_PARAM</pub:name>
            <pub:values>
              <pub:item>N</pub:item>
            </pub:values>
          </pub:item>
        </pub:parameterNameValues>
      </pub:reportRequest>
    </pub:runReport>
  </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

item.description:
This folder contains examples for each type of Download that can be duplicated as the starting point for your download source tests.

Do NOT duplicate this folder. It has a script that prevents its contents from being run when using the TestRunner environment. Instead, duplicate the required folder below this.

ie: either the REST, Soap, or OBIEE Example

This folder must not be moved, renamed, or deleted.

item.description:
This folder should contain sub-folders for each Download Source. Each Download Source folder then holds the specific request tests for that Download Source.

Create your download source folders by duplicating the specific folder from the Examples, rename the duplicate to your Source name, and move the new folder inside here.

<!-- select
  ORG_ID,
  RECEIVABLE_APPLICATION_ID,
  AMOUNT_APPLIED,
  STATUS,
  DISPLAY,
  APPLICATION_REF_NUM,
  CUSTOMER_REFERENCE,

  APPLIED_CUSTOMER_TRX_ID,
  APPLIED_PAYMENT_SCHEDULE_ID
from
  ar_receivable_applications_all

item.name: Adjustments (SOAP)

body.raw:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:typ="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/financials/receivables/transactions/adjustments/adjustmentService/types/" xmlns:adj="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/financials/receivables/transactions/adjustments/adjustmentService/" xmlns:adj1="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/financials/receivables/transactions/adjustments/model/flex/AdjustmentsDff/" xmlns:adj2="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/flex/financials/receivables/transactions/adjustments/AdjustmentGdf/">
    <soapenv:Header/>
    <soapenv:Body>
        <typ:createAdjustment>
            <typ:adjustment>
                <!-- Query to see all adjustmentTypes, but we should only use 'M'
                select  meaning, description, lookup_code
                from    ar_lookups 
                where   lookup_type = 'ADJUSTMENT_CREATION_TYPE'
                and     enabled_flag = 'Y'
                and     sysdate between nvl(start_date_active,sysdate) and nvl(end_date_active,sysdate); -->
                <!-- We should default this to M (Manual) for the integrator -->
                <adj:AdjustmentType>M</adj:AdjustmentType>

                <!-- LOV 
                CHARGES,FREIGHT,INVOICE,LINE,TAX from AR_LOOKUPS 
                -->
                <adj:TransactionAdjustmentType>INVOICE</adj:TransactionAdjustmentType>

                <!-- Amount must be excluded for INVOICE TransactionAdjustmentType (it does the remaining balance)-->
                <!-- Amount will be entered for LINE, CHARGES, FREIGHT, and TAX TransactionAdjustmentType -->
                <!-- <adj:Amount currencyCode="USD">-5</adj:Amount>  -->

                <!-- ApplyDate is the Adjustment Date in the UI -->
                <adj:ApplyDate>2024-10-16</adj:ApplyDate>

                <!-- GlDate is the Accounting Date in the UI -->
                <adj:GlDate>2024-10-16</adj:GlDate>

                <!-- LOV 
                SELECT CUSTOMER_TRX_ID FROM RA_CUSTOMER_TRX_ALL WHERE TRX_NUMBER='<InvTrxNum>'; 
                    -->
                <adj:CustomerTrxId>300000270271642</adj:CustomerTrxId>

                <!-- LOV
                SELECT PAYMENT_SCHEDULE_ID FROM AR_PAYMENT_SCHEDULES_ALL WHERE CUSTOMER_TRX_ID=(SELECT CUSTOMER_TRX_ID FROM RA_CUSTOMER_TRX_ALL WHERE TRX_NUMBER='<InvTrxNum>'); 
                    -->
                <adj:PaymentScheduleId>1265811</adj:PaymentScheduleId>

                    <!-- LOV
                    select  name, description, receivables_trx_id
                    from    ar_receivables_trx 
                    where   status = 'A'
                    and     type = 'ADJUST'
                    and     sysdate between nvl(start_date_active,sysdate) and nvl(end_date_active,sysdate)
                    and     sysdate <= nvl(inactive_date,sysdate)
                    and org_id = 300000046987012; -->
                <adj:ReceivablesTrxId>300000047295446</adj:ReceivablesTrxId>

                <adj:CurrencyCode>USD</adj:CurrencyCode>
                
                <!-- BU ID -->
                <adj:OrgId>300000046987012</adj:OrgId>

                <!-- Not sure if we need the invoice line id (CustomerTrxLineId) -->
                <!-- <adj:CustomerTrxLineId>300000270271643</adj:CustomerTrxLineId> -->

                <!-- OTHER PARAMETERS
                <adj:AcctdAmount currencyCode="USD">-5</adj:AcctdAmount>
                <adj:AdjustmentNumber>?</adj:AdjustmentNumber>
                <adj:AdjustmentId>?</adj:AdjustmentId>
                <adj:ApprovedBy>?</adj:ApprovedBy>
                <adj:AssociatedApplicationId>?</adj:AssociatedApplicationId>
                <adj:AssociatedCashReceiptId>?</adj:AssociatedCashReceiptId>
                <adj:AutomaticallyGenerated>?</adj:AutomaticallyGenerated>
                <adj:BatchId>?</adj:BatchId>
                <adj:ChargebackCustomerTrxId>?</adj:ChargebackCustomerTrxId>
                <adj:CodeCombinationId>?</adj:CodeCombinationId>
                <adj:Comments>?</adj:Comments>
                <adj:ConsInvId>?</adj:ConsInvId>
                <adj:CreatedFrom>?</adj:CreatedFrom>
                <adj:DistributionSetId>?</adj:DistributionSetId>
                <adj:EventId>?</adj:EventId>
                <adj:GlPostedDate>?</adj:GlPostedDate>
                <adj:InterestHeaderId>?</adj:InterestHeaderId>
                <adj:InterestLineId>?</adj:InterestLineId>
                <adj:LinkToTrxHistId>?</adj:LinkToTrxHistId>
                <adj:OrgId>?</adj:OrgId>
                <adj:PaymentScheduleId>?</adj:PaymentScheduleId>
                <adj:Postable>?</adj:Postable>
                <adj:PostingControlId>?</adj:PostingControlId>
                <adj:ReasonCode>?</adj:ReasonCode>
                <adj:ReceivablesTrxId>?</adj:ReceivablesTrxId>
                <adj:SetOfBooksId>?</adj:SetOfBooksId>
                <adj:Status>?</adj:Status>
                <adj:SubsequentTrxId>?</adj:SubsequentTrxId>
                <adj:UpgradeMethod>?</adj:UpgradeMethod>
                <adj:CurrencyCode>?</adj:CurrencyCode>
                <adj:TransactionAdjustmentType>?</adj:TransactionAdjustmentType>
                <adj:ObjectVersionNumber>?</adj:ObjectVersionNumber>
                <adj:LineAdjustedAmount currencyCode="?">?</adj:LineAdjustedAmount>
                <adj:TaxAdjustedAmount currencyCode="?">?</adj:TaxAdjustedAmount>
                <adj:FreightAdjustedAmount>?</adj:FreightAdjustedAmount>
                <adj:ReceivablesChargesAdjustedAmount currencyCode="?">?</adj:ReceivablesChargesAdjustedAmount>
                <adj:DocumentSequenceId>?</adj:DocumentSequenceId>
                <adj:DocumentSequenceValue>?</adj:DocumentSequenceValue>
                <adj:USSGLTransactionCode>?</adj:USSGLTransactionCode>
                <adj:USSGLTransactionCodeContext>?</adj:USSGLTransactionCodeContext> -->
                <!-- <adj:AdjustmentFLEX>

response.name: Create Adjustment

body.raw:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:typ="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/financials/receivables/transactions/adjustments/adjustmentService/types/" xmlns:adj="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/financials/receivables/transactions/adjustments/adjustmentService/" xmlns:adj1="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/financials/receivables/transactions/adjustments/model/flex/AdjustmentsDff/" xmlns:adj2="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/flex/financials/receivables/transactions/adjustments/AdjustmentGdf/">
    <soapenv:Header/>
    <soapenv:Body>
        <typ:createAdjustment>
            <typ:adjustment>
                <!-- select  meaning, description, lookup_code
                from    ar_lookups 
                where   lookup_type = 'ADJUSTMENT_CREATION_TYPE'
                and     enabled_flag = 'Y'
                and     sysdate between nvl(start_date_active,sysdate) and nvl(end_date_active,sysdate); -->
                <!-- We should default this to M for the integrator -->
                <adj:AdjustmentType>M</adj:AdjustmentType>

                <!-- CHARGES,FREIGHT,INVOICE,LINE,TAX from AR_LOOKUPS -->
                <adj:TransactionAdjustmentType>INVOICE</adj:TransactionAdjustmentType>

                <!-- Amount must be excluded for INVOICE AdjustmentType (it does the remaining balance)-->
                <!-- Amount will be entered for LINE AdjustmentType -->
                <!-- <adj:Amount currencyCode="USD">-5</adj:Amount>  -->

                <!-- ApplyDate is the Adjustment Date in the UI -->
                <adj:ApplyDate>2024-10-16</adj:ApplyDate>

                <!-- GlDate is the Accounting Date in the UI -->
                <adj:GlDate>2024-10-16</adj:GlDate>

                <!-- SELECT CUSTOMER_TRX_ID FROM RA_CUSTOMER_TRX_ALL WHERE TRX_NUMBER='<InvTrxNum>'; -->
                <adj:CustomerTrxId>300000270271642</adj:CustomerTrxId>

                <!-- SELECT PAYMENT_SCHEDULE_ID FROM AR_PAYMENT_SCHEDULES_ALL WHERE CUSTOMER_TRX_ID=(SELECT CUSTOMER_TRX_ID FROM RA_CUSTOMER_TRX_ALL WHERE TRX_NUMBER='<InvTrxNum>'); -->
                <adj:PaymentScheduleId>1265811</adj:PaymentScheduleId>

                    <!-- select  name, description, receivables_trx_id
                    from    ar_receivables_trx 
                    where   status = 'A'
                    and     type = 'ADJUST'
                    and     sysdate between nvl(start_date_active,sysdate) and nvl(end_date_active,sysdate)
                    and     sysdate <= nvl(inactive_date,sysdate)
                    and org_id = 300000046987012; -->
                <adj:ReceivablesTrxId>300000047295446</adj:ReceivablesTrxId>

                <adj:CurrencyCode>USD</adj:CurrencyCode>
                
                <!-- BU ID -->
                <adj:OrgId>300000046987012</adj:OrgId>

                <!-- Not sure if we need the invoice line id (CustomerTrxLineId) -->
                <!-- <adj:CustomerTrxLineId>300000270271643</adj:CustomerTrxLineId> -->

                <!-- OTHER PARAMETERS
                <adj:AcctdAmount currencyCode="USD">-5</adj:AcctdAmount>
                <adj:AdjustmentNumber>?</adj:AdjustmentNumber>
                <adj:AdjustmentId>?</adj:AdjustmentId>
                <adj:ApprovedBy>?</adj:ApprovedBy>
                <adj:AssociatedApplicationId>?</adj:AssociatedApplicationId>
                <adj:AssociatedCashReceiptId>?</adj:AssociatedCashReceiptId>
                <adj:AutomaticallyGenerated>?</adj:AutomaticallyGenerated>
                <adj:BatchId>?</adj:BatchId>
                <adj:ChargebackCustomerTrxId>?</adj:ChargebackCustomerTrxId>
                <adj:CodeCombinationId>?</adj:CodeCombinationId>
                <adj:Comments>?</adj:Comments>
                <adj:ConsInvId>?</adj:ConsInvId>
                <adj:CreatedFrom>?</adj:CreatedFrom>
                <adj:DistributionSetId>?</adj:DistributionSetId>
                <adj:EventId>?</adj:EventId>
                <adj:GlPostedDate>?</adj:GlPostedDate>
                <adj:InterestHeaderId>?</adj:InterestHeaderId>
                <adj:InterestLineId>?</adj:InterestLineId>
                <adj:LinkToTrxHistId>?</adj:LinkToTrxHistId>
                <adj:OrgId>?</adj:OrgId>
                <adj:PaymentScheduleId>?</adj:PaymentScheduleId>
                <adj:Postable>?</adj:Postable>
                <adj:PostingControlId>?</adj:PostingControlId>
                <adj:ReasonCode>?</adj:ReasonCode>
                <adj:ReceivablesTrxId>?</adj:ReceivablesTrxId>
                <adj:SetOfBooksId>?</adj:SetOfBooksId>
                <adj:Status>?</adj:Status>
                <adj:SubsequentTrxId>?</adj:SubsequentTrxId>
                <adj:UpgradeMethod>?</adj:UpgradeMethod>
                <adj:CurrencyCode>?</adj:CurrencyCode>
                <adj:TransactionAdjustmentType>?</adj:TransactionAdjustmentType>
                <adj:ObjectVersionNumber>?</adj:ObjectVersionNumber>
                <adj:LineAdjustedAmount currencyCode="?">?</adj:LineAdjustedAmount>
                <adj:TaxAdjustedAmount currencyCode="?">?</adj:TaxAdjustedAmount>
                <adj:FreightAdjustedAmount>?</adj:FreightAdjustedAmount>
                <adj:ReceivablesChargesAdjustedAmount currencyCode="?">?</adj:ReceivablesChargesAdjustedAmount>
                <adj:DocumentSequenceId>?</adj:DocumentSequenceId>
                <adj:DocumentSequenceValue>?</adj:DocumentSequenceValue>
                <adj:USSGLTransactionCode>?</adj:USSGLTransactionCode>
                <adj:USSGLTransactionCodeContext>?</adj:USSGLTransactionCodeContext> -->
                <!-- <adj:AdjustmentFLEX>
                    <adj1:AdjustmentId>?</adj1:AdjustmentId>
                    <adj1:__FLEX_Context>?</adj1:__FLEX_Context>
                    <adj1:__FLEX_Context_DisplayValue>?</adj1:__FLEX_Context_DisplayValue>
                    <adj1:_FLEX_NumOfSegments>?</adj1:_FLEX_NumOfSegments>
                </adj:AdjustmentFLEX>
                <adj:AdjustmentGdf>
                    <adj2:AdjustmentId>?</adj2:AdjustmentId>
                    <adj2:FLEX_PARAM_GLOBAL_COUNTRY_CODE>?</adj2:FLEX_PARAM_GLOBAL_COUNTRY_CODE>
                    <adj2:__FLEX_Context>?</adj2:__FLEX_Context>
                    <adj2:__FLEX_Context_DisplayValue>?</adj2:__FLEX_Context_DisplayValue>
                    <adj2:_FLEX_NumOfSegments>?</adj2:_FLEX_NumOfSegments>
                </adj:AdjustmentGdf> -->
            </typ:adjustment>
        </typ:createAdjustment>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

  <soapenv:Body>
    <typ:createMiscellaneousReceipt>
      <typ:miscellaneousReceipt>
        <com:OrgId>300000046987012</com:OrgId>
        <com:ReceiptMethodName>Check (Directly/No Remit)</com:ReceiptMethodName>
        <com:ReceiptNumber>AA26082025-01</com:ReceiptNumber>
        <com:ReceivableActivityName>Miscellaneous Cash</com:ReceivableActivityName>

        <com:Amount>100</com:Amount>
        <com:RemittanceBankAccountId>300000047314453</com:RemittanceBankAccountId>
        <com:DepositDate>2025-09-19T00:00:00</com:DepositDate>
        <com:CurrencyCode>USD</com:CurrencyCode>
        <com:Comments>Integrator Misc Receipt Test Dist</com:Comments>
        <com:MiscellaneousReceiptFLEXVA xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="mis:More4appsReceipts">
          <mis:__FLEX_Context>M4A_RECEIPTS</mis:__FLEX_Context>
          <mis:printedReceipt>Yes</mis:printedReceipt>
          <mis:receiptSource>Reception Counter</mis:receiptSource>
        </com:MiscellaneousReceiptFLEXVA>
        <com:MiscellaneousReceiptDistributionsService>
          <com:ConcatSegment>101.10.41000.120.235.000</com:ConcatSegment>
          <com:Percent>10</com:Percent>
